revised_title: Anatomical Study of Macgillivrayia pelagica and Cheletropis Huxleyi: Establishing a New Gasteropoda Genus
tldr: The author examines the anatomy of Macgillivrayia pelagica and Cheletropis Huxleyi, suggesting the establishment of a new genus of Gasteropoda due to their distinct shell differences despite sharing similar respiratory organs.
